Vēstures satriecošie stāsti. Dokumentālu filmu cikls (oriģinālvalodas izvēle)
Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: Since 1993 UFO sightings have haunted some residents of Phoenix, Arizona. Reports from hundreds of people all note seeing a triangular formation of lights in the sky. Ryder, Ben, and James start by watching the video footage first captured in 1993 that also highlights a similar shaped item floating above. The man who caught the sighting on video, Terry Connet, comes forward to explain just how enormous and eerily silent the object was. After the original Phoenix Lights incident, the military stated that it was simply dropped flairs from a nearby Air Force Base, others believe it was skydivers.

programme.title: Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: Before NASA's shuttle program shut down, residents in Florida reported a series of strange glowing orbs trailing the shuttle's launch into space. Ryder, Ben, and James launch a daring mission around Kennedy Space Center to investigate if aliens are watching earth from above. The team's determination to conclude if aliens are spying on our world involves braving swamps infested with reptiles and even evading an oncoming boat.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Everything that we do to move, live, work, play, create, and survive, is sustained by spinning a wheel. We've long relied on fossil fuels, but the supply is finite and the environmental costs of burning them are growing. Enter a new generation of inventors, innovators, and entrepreneurs who are looking to the edge of discovery for new ways to keep these wheels in motion.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Planet Earth is often called "The Blue Marble". It's not until you take a closer look that you discover that despite its surface being covered with water, there is very little water to drink. Our population of 7 billion people and millions of animal species share just 1% of the water available on our planet. With climate change savaging weather systems and our population steadily rising, scientists and engineers all over the world are struggling to create local solutions for the growing global water problem.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: What would happen if all of the worlds volcanoes erupted at the same time? This one hour special examines this terrifying scenario by exploring the very real, and very deadly, science of volcanic activity. This special posits that a primordial black hole, a tiny but massive theoretical entity, could slams into the planet, punching a hole through it like a bullet through an apple. Earth would survive the impact but the black hole would generate a colossal shockwave that disturbs the magma chamber beneath every existing volcanic system. See what could happen when, the planets volcanoes begin to erupt, generating their lethal effects in an ever-widening crisis on land and in the air.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: What might happen if a strange dark force pulls earth from its orbit around the sun and sends us drifting out into the cold darkness of space, an icy chill descends, robbing us of warmth and food? Could mankind find ways to insulate ourselves and survive in a darkening, alien environment? Can the heart of our planet take the place of the only source of warmth and light mankind has ever known: our sun? Find out…

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: The Itaipu Dam is the world's largest hydroelectric power plant and a triumph of giant-scale engineering. Find out how engineers and over forty thousand Brazilian and Paraguayan workers toiled around the clock to create this immense structure. Follow the story as they lay millions of tons of concrete, divert the course of the world's 7th largest river, and relocate thousands of people and animals in order to bring power to millions of people in two countries while overcoming impossible odds and breaking construction and engineering records.

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: The Kansai Airport in Japan is considered to be one of the great engineering achievements in the world, second only to the Panama Canal. It is a "State-of-the-Art" facility that handles over a million passengers a week. It has all the operational problems of a normal International Airport, but on top of that it has to contend with typhoons, earthquakes and to top it all off¿ it's sinking! We will go behind the scenes to figure out how this feat of engineering works

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The spring season progresses and the residents of Port Protection encounter tasks and challenges. Curly is a good neighbor by helping his friend Jiggy with a rotten tree that threatens to fall on his house and finds his experience and determination tested. Mary passes the torch of knowledge to Amanda, teaching her the finer points on how to hunt and track game to provide her with the tools to survive on her own. Sam readies the fire patrol boat, staging a fire drill with other community members, which involves setting a real fire.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: Lawless Island is a series focusing on a group of people who have chosen a new life far away in Alaska. United by their extreme independence and love of the wild, the show's characters have left civilized way of life behind. Now they have to deal with many different things common people do not encounter in there every day routine, like hunting and stocking the freezers, fishing, farming in order to survive. It makes them realize how dependable they are on each other.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Gritty documentary series. The award-winning journalist, Mariana van Zeller, investigates international smuggling, underground economies and black markets around the world. Entering into such highly-dangerous areas of drug-dealing, prostitution, animal trafficking and gunrunning. Van Zeller tries to understand life in these fascinating criminal underworlds.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Gritty documentary series. The award-winning journalist, Mariana van Zeller, investigates international smuggling, underground economies and black markets around the world. Entering into such highly-dangerous areas of drug-dealing, prostitution, animal trafficking and gunrunning. Van Zeller tries to understand life in these fascinating criminal underworlds.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the 'Curse of the Afterlife'. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Why did the great pharaohs of Egypt abandon the pyramids of Giza and choose a secret cemetery in the Valley of the kings as their burial ground? In the shadow of the pyramids, an extraordinary discovery in a rare 4,5000 tomb. We descend 100 meters underground to investigate the first tomb ever built in the valley, whilst a team from the University of Basel are on the hunt for clues to identify human remains found in looted tombs.

programme.title: Egypt with the World's Greatest Explorer
programme.desc: Epic and incredible three-part documentary series in which world's greatest living explorer and real-life Indiana Jones, Sir Ranulph Fiennes, recreates his 1969 expedition along the River Nile, taking his cousin, actor Joseph Fiennes, with him. The incredible duo will start their journey at the port of Alexandria and work their way down the River Nile to Cairo, spending the night inside the Great Pyramid of Giza before crossing the Eastern Desert to the Red Sea, and then finally ending up in Luxor, down to Lake Nasser and the border with Sudan. Throughout their journey, 74-year-old Ran will teach 48-year-old Joseph some extreme survival techniques and their amazing adventures will include making their way through snake-infested tunnels, mummified bodies, exploring some of the newly discovered ancient Egyptian tombs, and getting some practice in the oldest martial art in the world- tahtib.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Archaeologists find extraordinary new evidence about how the ancient Egyptians prepared for the afterlife. We investigate the most elaborate tomb in the valley of the kings, built for the great pharaoh Seti I, the tomb reveals the sacred text needed to secure life after death. A vast necropolis gives up its secrets as a team discovers a sealed tomb untouched for 4,000 years. Whilst analysis of a gruesome cache of mummified remains reveals the disturbing lengths grave robbers went to in search of treasures and gold.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt

programme.title: Clash of the Collectors
programme.desc: We meet a passionate Italian whose love of industrial design has led him to amass a collection of vintage vacuum cleaners

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: Across the U.S., men and women battle the elements to make a living off the land. In the forests of Michigan, Chris Matherly and Levena Holmes search high and low for prized wild mushrooms. They have a large order from a new client, but only limited time to fill it. Chris and Levena struggle to find the right mushrooms and are running out of time. In Chico, CA, Al takes a huge risk on a large burl. This burl could mean a big payday for Al, or it could be worthless. On the Delaware River, Ray is not catching as many eels as he should. He suspects something, or someone, is stealing his eels. Can his new surveillance system catch the thief? In Maine, Jim and Andy run into their rivals: the clam diggers. Both groups need the mudflats to make a living.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob suddenly becomes the richest citizen of Bikini Bottom, he finds himself surrounded by lots of new friends. It's the day of Squidward's lead solo audition with the Bikini Bottom Men's Choir, and Squidward is brimming with excitement.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: There's a new Viking-themed promotion at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob is determined to find out everything there is to know about Vikings. Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are having a book signing, but SpongeBob can't go because he has boating school.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: It's time for the band to make their first music video. Both Tomika and Freddie have ideas, but totally different ones. This causes tension in the band, as the two of them keep arguing. They can't make the video with the two of them fighting, so Mr Finn tells them they will shoot it without them. He hopes this would make them rejoin the band and give up their discussion. But it doesn't work, so they need a new solution if they want the whole band in the video.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: When Annie finds a lost wallet, she's determined to return it to its owner and prove she's a good person. Annie and Pony get locked out of their building, and they can't seem to convince their neighbors to let them back in.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flip's and compete to win the manager title. When Lincoln sees how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his older age, he takes him out for a day to remember.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Lincoln's four-year-old sister, Lisa, gets put into his 5th grade class, his social standing is at stake! Sick of their family van always falling apart, the kids decide to try and trick Dad into buying a cool new van.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Side Hustle
programme.desc: The "Dance Dance Altoonisburg" competition is coming up and Lex, Presley and Munchy are excited to take part. But when an old friend from Lex and Presley's past hires them for a KidDING, their dance crew and friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Every April Fool's Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked. The Loud kids make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for Mom, but Lincoln has other plans.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Lincoln's mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. After Lucy reads Lincoln's fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster", Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Учитель в законе. Возвращение
programme.desc: С тех пор как Борис Богомолов, он же Богомол, в прошлом – вор в законе, а ныне – добропорядочный учитель, нашел своего сына Ваню, прошел целый год. Они вместе живут в городе Солнечный, Ваня ходит в школу, а Борис Андреевич руководит приютом для детей. С законом у Богомола все в порядке, с прошлым он завязал.… Но неожиданно учителя вновь затягивает водоворот криминальных событий: во время рейдерского захвата ювелирного завода директора производства расстреливают прямо у проходной. Происходит это сразу после его встречи с Богомолом, который тут же становится главным подозреваемым. Настоящий заказчик и захвата, и убийства — авторитет Вагон. Вскоре становится очевидно, что эти преступления — лишь мелкая деталь в криминальной схеме по продаже за границу ворованных якутских алмазов. Удастся ли учителю обелить себя, вывести на чистую воду преступников и спасти сына, на которого объявил охоту коварный враг?

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Дорожные войны
programme.desc: Ежедневно сотрудники ГИБДД становятся участниками настоящих ожесточенных дорожных войн. Они в курсе всех происшествий, которые происходят на трассах России, и изо всех сил стараются вовремя догнать преступника и призвать его к уголовной ответственности. Каждая подобная операция балансирует на грани жизни и смерти, справедливости и безнаказанности. Программа позволит посмотреть на самые запоминающиеся случаи на дороге. Эта передача придется по душе всем поклонникам динамичных погонь и автомобильных преследований. Все события происходят на бешеной скорости, нужно смотреть в оба, чтобы догнать виновного, но при этом самому не навлечь на себя опасность. Пронзительный вой мигалок и скрежет асфальта под колесами разбушевавшихся автомобилей — этого будет вдоволь в каждом выпуске. Программа Дорожные войны основывается исключительно на достоверных источниках. Сюжет всегда подтверждается записями видеорегистраторов свидетелей, самих нарушителей либо сотрудников правоохранительных органов. Иногда им удается запечатлеть просто невероятные моменты, которые по увлекательности не уступают даже популярным боевикам. Увидев качество их работы, количество нарушающих правила дорожного движения просто обязано сократиться.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Dienas personība
programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā katru darba dienu tiek aicināta kāda aktuāla personība attiecīgajam laikam, pilsētas aktualitātēm un notikumiem.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Strange Creatures is a documentary series dedicated to the majestic Animal Kingdom and its weirdest, most unusual creatures. Nature never stops surprising us with its unique species and evolutionary unlike living things. Have a look at species with extraordinary survival skills, animals who camouflage in a skillful way for different reasons, creatures that convincingly play dead, find out if a grasshopper can vomit. These and much more amazing facts about animals are there for you in Strange Creatures.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: The Big Feed
programme.desc: The Big Feed is an educational documentary that looks at all our favourite animals, studying the way that they eat. The show goes behind the scenes of the world's most famous zoos to explore how they perform the gargantuan task of feeding thousands of animals everyday. From big cats to aquatic animals, and panda bears to meerkats, each animal has to be carefully catered for, with consideration to their nutritional needs and taste preferences. The big feed is like trying to feed an entire city everyday.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Super Smart Animals
programme.desc: Could a chimp beat you in a maths test? Prepare to witness some of the most amazing examples of animal intelligence ever captured on camera as this series asks: what makes some animals smarter than others, and could they even outsmart us?

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. Whether you want to join the police or write your first novel as an author, or cook sumptuous dishes as a chef, make people laugh as a comedian, wow the crowds as a footballer or even govern the country as a politician, this series sets out to discover just what it takes!

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Strange Creatures is a documentary series dedicated to the majestic Animal Kingdom and its weirdest, most unusual creatures. programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: Super Smart Animals
programme.desc: As we continue to learn more about the animal species that inhabit our planet, we also uncover their brilliance and intelligence. For many years, centuries even, the notion that animals could be intelligent seemed preposterous. Thanks to huge advances in science, we now know that many animals are highly impressive thinkers, each in their own unique way. Join animal biologist Liz Bonnin as she dives into the minds of different creatures to understand how they think. From mathematical chimpanzees to socially-tuned grey whales, watch as Liz reveals the brilliance of these remarkable animals.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos srities "Khimki" – Maskvos CSKA
Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga

Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos CSKA – Zieliona Guros "Zieliona Gura"
Copes garša
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Подруги поневоле
programme.desc: Мало того, что ограбление, которое планировала Мэл, пошло не по плану, так ещё и её заложница – Фрэнни, оказалась крайне впечатлительной особой, склонной к паническим атакам. И теперь, когда на хвосте копы, уже не понятно кто в этой паре является большей жертвой. Но, несмотря на всю разницу между ними, у этих двух девушек есть что-то общее. И в какой-то момент они уже сами перестают понимать, кто они друг для друга: враги или лучшие подруги.

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.

programme.title: Джекпот
programme.desc: Испуганный и окровавленный, Оскар Свендсен просыпается с ружьём в руках в сомнительном заведении. Вокруг него 8 трупов и полиция, направляющаяся к нему. Оскар знает, что он невиновен. А всё началось с того, что четыре парня выиграли 1,7 миллиона в лотерею...

programme.title: Война Мерфи
programme.desc: 'Тул, Шан Филлипс, Филипп Нуаре, Хорст Янсон. Хорошо поставленный, захватывающий боевик о войне, в котором наряду с батальными сценами дается психологический портрет английского моряка, который один остался в живых после того, как его судно оказалось потоплено немцами. Опираясь на помощь местного населения, после восстановления здоровья, он, одержимый местью, решает один напасть на немецкую армию, несмотря на то, что война уже закончилась...

programme.title: Охота
programme.desc: Учитель живет одинокой жизнью, все время борется за опеку над сыном. Его жизнь постепенно становится лучше, когда он находит любовь и получает хорошие новости от сына, но его новая жизнь вот-вот будет жестоко разрушена невинной ложью.

programme.title: Подруги поневоле
programme.desc: Мало того, что ограбление, которое планировала Мэл, пошло не по плану, так ещё и её заложница – Фрэнни, оказалась крайне впечатлительной особой, склонной к паническим атакам. И теперь, когда на хвосте копы, уже не понятно кто в этой паре является большей жертвой. Но, несмотря на всю разницу между ними, у этих двух девушек есть что-то общее. И в какой-то момент они уже сами перестают понимать, кто они друг для друга: враги или лучшие подруги.

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.

programme.title: Холостяк
programme.desc: Комедия, Италия, Испания. 1956 / Паоло Анзельми, убеждённый холостяк, считает, что брак стеснит его свободу. После того как его друг Армандо женился, Паоло переезжает из их общей квартиры в небольшой пансионат и знакомится с молодой хозяйкой Габриэлой. Между ними завязываются серьёзные отношения, продолжающиеся до тех пор, пока она не заговаривает о женитьбе. Вырвавшись на свободу, Паоло бросается c головой в новые любовные приключения, но в конце концов разочаровывается во всём и чувствует себя одиноким. Кроме того и мать Паоло настаивает на его женитьбе. Но у всех возможных кандидаток есть какие-то недостатки: ревность, многочисленная родня, слишком болтливы. Но вот на его пути встречается Карла...

programme.title: Удалить историю
programme.desc: Жизнь троих обитателей городка подчинена новейшим технологиям и опутана социальными сетями. Бессмысленные покупки по интернету, тотальная зависимость от логинов и паролей, погоня за лайками и рейтингами, видеокомпроматы превращают существование героев в жесточайший абсурд. Чтобы выбраться из этой дьявольской ловушки, им не остается ничего другого, кроме как обратиться за помощью к гениальному хакеру – 'заместителю" бога на земле. Сердобольный технарь дает современным грешникам спасительный шанс – им нужно проникнуть в iCloud-хранилища могущественных интернет-корпораций и удалить свои персональные истории.

programme.title: Кто есть кто?
programme.desc: -Поль Бельмондо, Жули Жезекель, Жорж Жере, Мари Лафоре. После загадочной гибели комиссара жандармерии Ниццы, в город, из Парижа, приезжает инспектор надзорного отдела, чтобы вскрыть коррупцию, царящую среди стражей правопорядка. Но методы его работы заставляют недоумевать, кого он больше напоминает, непринужденный и обольстительный, ловко действующий кулаками, но не чуждый сердечным порывам.

programme.title: Предел риска
programme.desc: Сентябрь 2008 года. Мировой экономический кризис уже начался, но Америка еще не знает, какая катастрофа ждет впереди, и только группа топ-менеджеров на Уолл-Стрит ищет рецепт спасения. Это были самые страшные часы в их жизни… Сотрудник одного из крупнейших инвестиционных банков с помощью новейшей программы рыночного анализа получает ошеломляющий прогноз – акции упадут, рынок рухнет, банк потеряет все. Утром следующего дня он попадает под сокращение и перед уходом передает флэшку с опасной информацией своему бывшему помощнику. К вечеру лучшие аналитики банка, проверив эти вычисления, осознали ужасную перспективу: крах неминуем. Теперь они стоят перед выбором: начать срочный сброс акций, что оставит и крупных акционеров во всем мире, и миллионы рядовых вкладчиков ни с чем – или ждать развития событий, что чревато потерей вообще всего. Решать нужно здесь и сейчас. На кону – огромные деньги и будущее каждого. В эту ночь у риска нет предела…

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.
